Articles.Content:
Sonic-1 Is the first in the Sonic series.

This high-tech jet can reach amazing speed in seconds, has extreme maneuverability and much more!

Features:

-Additional SAS

-Lots of intakes for 30000m cruising

-Ejection system

-RCS system for control in vacuum and thin layers of the atmosphere

Action groups:

1-Toggle engines

2-Togle intakes

Download: After page reaches 10 posts

Property of Zokesia Skunkworks

Edited August 28, 2013 by iDan122
Uploaded wrong video, new video available soon.
